docs.snippet: Some Americans’ allergy to apology meets up with exasperation over so-called political correctness. For others, there’s celebration in defiance.

headline.main: Is Being ‘Unapologetic’ the New Patriotic — or a Form of Resistance?

docs.snippet: After witnessing teachers, pupils and schools caught in the crossfire of war, Diego Ibarra Sánchez began working on “Hijacked Education,” which examines how constant conflict has upended education.

headline.main: When Education Is Hijacked by War

docs.abstract: After witnessing teachers, pupils and schools caught in the crossfire of war, Diego Ibarra Sánchez began working on “Hijacked Education,” which examines how constant conflict has upended education.

docs.snippet: A 16-year-old participating in a summer training camp was hoisting a large log overhead with four other boys when the log fell.

headline.print_headline: Long Island Football Player Dies After Being Hit by Log in Training
headline.main: Long Island Football Player Dies After Being Hit by 400-Pound Log

docs.snippet: Gov. Eddie Calvo uploaded a phone call with President Trump to social media in which Mr. Trump says, “We are with you 1,000 percent.”

headline.print_headline: Guam Tourism Will Rise,  Trump Tells Governor
headline.main: Trump to Guam Governor: North Korea Threats Will Boost Tourism ‘Tenfold’

docs.snippet: Live-streaming apps like Facebook Live and Periscope give us a voyeuristic peek into the lives of others. But what is our obligation when we encounter digital violence?

headline.main: What the Kitty Genovese Killing Can Teach Today’s Digital Bystanders

docs.snippet: A hard-right group chartered a ship to monitor the rescue of migrants. But when it ran into engine trouble on the Mediterranean, it rejected an offer of help from an aid vessel.

headline.print_headline: Hard Right Has Hard Luck Tracking Migrant Rescues
headline.main: Ship Monitoring Rescues of Migrants Refuses to Be Rescued

docs.snippet: The police do not know who shot Willie Cooper, 58, over the weekend. He was walking near the nonprofit organization where he worked to help the city’s young people.

headline.print_headline: Crusader Against Violence Dies in a Drive-By Shooting
headline.main: Anti-Violence Activist Is Fatally Shot in Chicago

docs.snippet: We want to explore which commercials push our readers’ buttons, and then ask the people who created the ads just what they had in mind.

headline.print_headline: Tell Us: What Commercials Do You Love, Hate, or Love to Hate?
headline.main: Tell Us: What Commercials Do You Love, Hate, or Love to Hate?

docs.snippet: The 16-month-old girl’s father said she had fallen off a bed, but a medical evaluation concluded that her injuries had been inflicted intentionally.

headline.print_headline: Toddler Dies After 5 Days In Coma; Father in Jail
headline.main: Baby in Coma for 5 Days Dies in Brooklyn; Father Remains Jailed

docs.snippet: In truth, interpersonal skills like collaboration, communication and empathy are vital to career success in technology.
